title: Update shop name to Vikash Sports

requirements.text: Update the shop branding text so the app displays the shop name as "Vikash Sports" anywhere the shop/site title is shown (including the header title and the browser tab/page title).
acceptanceCriteria: The header title text displays exactly "Vikash Sports".
The browser tab/page title displays "Vikash Sports" (or "Vikash Sports" plus an optional short suffix) and does not show the old name.
All user-facing text involved in this change is in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as frontend immutablePaths.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding a cart page or checkout flow.
Changing product data, pricing, or cart logic.
Redesigning the overall UI theme beyond updating the shop name text.
